alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Roseau, northwestern Beltrami and Lake of the Woods Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 604 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Oak Island to near Gates Corner. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baudette, Arnesen, Williams, Roosevelt, Lude, Birch Beach and Oak Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; Roseau
